dtliExcerpt: More than any piece of theatre that has premiered on Broadway in the past few decades, Clyde’s could possibly transform the way that viewers regard their reformed brethren and demand that necessary reforms be passed to allow them to reintegrate into society. Until that time, I’m returning for an in-person encore viewing―Clyde’s is quite simply, that tantalizingly piquant.

keyPhrases.quote: Clyde's is quite simply, that tantalizingly piquant.
